[#soil-texture-modifier_result-value]
====== Result value

[frame=none, cols="1,5"]
|===
|Property | Value

|Identifier | `urn:shapes:soil-soil-pit-characterization-protocol-shapes:soil-texture-modifier:result-value`
|Label | Result value
|Definition | The value of `rdf:value` _MUST_ exist in the Soils texture modifiers codes controlled vocabulary.
|Comment | The value in `sosa:hasResult` _MUST_ be a value in `sh:in`, which is the Soils texture modifiers codes controlled vocabulary.
include::../../../../statuses/submitted.adoc[]
|Conformance Classes | `TBA`

|Property | Value
|Controlled list items | The result value MUST be from the following list: 

link:https://linked.data.gov.au/def/nrm/857967f1-5efe-5eb7-a3b4-38d700482ebc[`Coarse sandy`] 

link:https://linked.data.gov.au/def/nrm/40abc525-9b15-59db-ad29-982ea582456d[`Fine sandy`] 

link:https://linked.data.gov.au/def/nrm/71cc28b6-21ef-5fc7-ba20-0d56e0882c31[`Medium sandy`] 

link:https://linked.data.gov.au/def/nrm/1218dbaf-c438-5005-845e-39c2af813c9b[`Silty`]
